thread.section_title: ERIK'S Bike - Board - Ski Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of ERIK'S Bike - Board - Ski | eriksbikeshop.com | 3 of 51
thread.title: Josh
thread.title_full: ERIK'S Bike - Board - Ski reviewed by Josh

author: Josh
title: Josh
text:
By far the best customer service I have experienced. I bought a new MTB helmet from them and received the helmet on a Saturday. There was a flaw with the helmet and I mailed it back to them and before I got back from the Post Office, they had a new helmet on its way. On the phone they were awesome with the way they handled the situation.
J
